00021         void Camera::loadData(TiXmlElement *element)
00022         {
00023                         Vector2D::fromXML(element->FirstChildElement("position"), 
00024                                 &position);
00025             element->QueryFloatAttribute("maxdistance", &maxDistance);
00026 
00027             if(element->Attribute("target"))
00028                 target = element->Attribute("target");
00029 
00030             Entity *entity = getLevel()->getEntityById(target);
00031             if(entity)
00032                 setPosition(entity->getPosition());
00033         }
00034 
00035                 Camera::Camera(const std::string &target, float maxDistance,
00036                                 const math::Vector2D &position, Level *level)
00037         {
00038                         this->level = level;
00039                         this->position = position;
00040             this->target = target;
00041             this->maxDistance = maxDistance;
00042         }
00043 
00044         Camera::Camera(TiXmlElement *element, Level *level)
00045         {
00046                         this->level = level;
00047             load(element);
00048         }
00049 
00050         Camera::~Camera()
00051         {
00052         }
00053 
00054                 Level *Camera::getLevel() const
00055         {
00056             return level;
00057         }
00058 
00059         void Camera::update(float ms)
00060         {
00061             Entity *entity = getLevel()->getEntityById(target);
00062             if(entity) {
00063                 Vector2D position= getPosition();
00064                 Vector2D direction = entity->getPosition() - position;
00065                 if(direction.getLength() > maxDistance) {
00066                     direction.setLength((direction.getLength() - maxDistance));
00067                     setPosition(position + direction);
00068                 }
00069             }
00070         }
00071 
00072         const Vector2D &Camera::getPosition() const
00073         {
00074             return position;
00075         }
00076 
00077         void Camera::setPosition(const Vector2D &position)
00078         {
00079             this->position = position;
00080         }
00081 
00082         void Camera::transform() const
00083         {
00084             VideoManager *videoManager = VideoManager::getInstance();
00085             videoManager->translate(-position + videoManager->getSize() * 0.5f);
00086         }
00087 
00088         BoundingBox *Camera::getBoundingBox()
00089         {
00090             VideoManager *videoManager = VideoManager::getInstance();
00091             boundingBox = BoundingBox(position - videoManager->getSize() * 0.5f,
00092                     position + videoManager->getSize() * 0.5f);
00093             return &boundingBox;
00094         }
00095     }
